text: James Tomio Saito (born March 6, 1955) is a Japanese-American actor. Saito played the original Shredder in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Dr. Chen in the ABC series Eli Stone, Harry Kim in the Netflix movie Always Be My Maybe, and Kenji on Modern Love. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: James Saito
